item.description:
I've been wanting to go back to the Brewery again for another tour, so here it is. The tour is $1.00 and comes with 3-4 samples and souvenier glass. Afterward we will eat an early dinner at the Cataqua Public House.

About the Brewery:

In 1996, Red Hook commissioned its 4th brewery in Portsmouth NH. The additional capacity allowed Redhook to expand distribution while maintaining its high quality. In addition, the Cataqua Public House offers all Redhook's fine ales and a pub menu.

http://www.redhook.co...

Nashua Car Pool:

We will be leaving the Exit 6 (off Route 3) Welcome Center at 1:45 PM. I will be waiting in the welcome center between 1:30 PM and 1:45 PM.
item.how_to_find_us: I will wear a Meetup pin that says "FAN". Look for me at the entrance.
item.name: Red Hook Brewery Tour
